column17:
Product Description

Kesh King - Herbal Shampoo & Conditioner : Nutritional therapy for strong and shiny hair! With goodness of pure extracts of ALOE VERA Natural VITAMIN E and Glycerin. A 100% Ayurvedic Patented Medicine. With No Side Effects. Kesh King shampoo is gentle enough for daily use. Simply apply shampoo at several separate areas on warmly wet hair massage the scalp to distributor & insure the good lather through the strands of hair Rinse thoroughly by separating hair and directing water to scalp at several places.
